actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to exempt programs of the Federal National Mortgage Association from State usury laws, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Home Finance Leveraging Act of 1979 - Exempts programs of the Federal National Mortgage Association authorized under the National Housing Act or the Emergency Home Finance Act of 1970 from State and local usury laws.

titles.title: A bill to exempt programs of the Federal National Mortgage Association from State usury laws, and for other purposes.
